_comment: This package is not complete. The program might not work. Based on the portable version of LightBulb
description: LightBulb is an application that reduces eyestrain produced by staring at a computer screen when working late hours
notes: After installation, a registry key has been added to update the computer's gamma range. This is needed to make the program work. Please restart your computer to take use the program. Make sure .NET Framework version 4.5.2 or later is installed.
